summary:
## Jaycee Lee Dugard's Abduction and Rescue

In 1991, 11-year-old Jaycee Dugard was kidnapped in California. She was missing for 18 years until 2009, when police found her with two teenage girls, her biological daughters. The girls' father, Phillip Garrido, a sex offender, had abducted and raped Dugard, keeping her hidden in his backyard.

Garrido and his wife, Nancy, were arrested and sentenced to prison. Dugard wrote books about her experience and sued the state of California for not protecting her, winning a $20 million settlement.
title: Kidnapping of Jaycee Dugard
